attributes.action: Reintroduce emergency driving tests for key workers during the current lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to do this, because there is a massive backlog of driving tests all around the country, I myself am a key worker, and I have had my driving test cancelled 5 times in the pas 6 months.i need a driving license for my job.
attributes.background: I would like the government to reintroduce emergency tests for key critical workers during this lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
